languages.text: "Ваша Светлость!" {n}Высокий фактотум склоняется в глубоком поклоне. Данрок то и дело подносит к лицу надушенный платок, однако на лице его все же застыло угодливое выражение.{/n} "Члены вашего экипажа подали прошение о том, чтобы лично засвидетельствовать свое вечное почтение к Лорд-капитану. Молодой человек?"

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость!" {n}Высокий Фактотум склоняется в глубоком поклоне. Данрок то и дело подносит к лицу надушенный платок, однако на лице его все же застыло угодливое выражение.{/n} "Члены вашего экипажа подали прошение о том, чтобы лично засвидетельствовать свое вечное почтение к Лорд-капитану. Молодой человек?"

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The High Factotum bows low. Every few moments, Danrok brings a perfumed cloth to his face, but his expression remains obsequious.{/n} "Members of your crew have made a request to allow them to proclaim their most profound devotion to the Lord Captain... personally. Young man!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость!" {n}Высокий фактотум склоняется в глубоком поклоне. Данрок то и дело подносит к лицу надушенный платок, однако на лице его все же застыло угодливое выражение.{/n} "Члены вашего экипажа подали прошение о том, чтобы лично засвидетельствовать свое вечное почтение к Лорд-капитану. Молодой человек?"

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}High Factotum pays you a low bow. Danrok brings a perfumed cloth to his face over and over again, and yet his expression remains obsequious.{/n} "Members of your crew filed a request for allowing them to testify their eternal veneration to Lord Captain personally. Young man!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}High Factotum pays you a low bow. Danrok brings a perfumed cloth to his face over and over again, and yet his expression remains obsequious.{/n} "Members of your crew filed a request for allowing them to testify their eternal veneration to Lord Captain personally. Young man!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}High Factotum bows low. Danrok brings a perfumed cloth to his face again and again, but his expression remains obsequious.{/n} "Members of your crew have filed a request to allow them to personally proclaim their eternal veneration to the Lord Captain. Young man!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}High Factotum bows low. Danrok brings a perfumed cloth to his face again and again, but his expression remains obsequious.{/n} "Members of your crew have filed a request to allow them to personally proclaim their eternal veneration to the Lord Captain. Young man!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The High Factotum bows low. Every few moments, Danrok brings a perfumed cloth to his face, but his expression remains obsequious.{/n} "Members of your crew have made a request to allow them to proclaim their most profound devotion to the Lord Captain... personally. Young man!"

languages.text: “大人！”{n}高阶顾问丹罗克向你深鞠一躬。每隔一会儿，他就会用沾着香水的汗巾擦一下脸，但表情始终充满了谄媚之意。{/n}“您的船员向您提出申请，希望能……亲自向他们的舰长大人表达他们最赤诚的敬意，都是些年轻人！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The High Factotum bows low. Every few moments, Danrok brings a perfumed cloth to his face, but his expression remains obsequious.{/n} "Members of your crew have made a request to allow them to proclaim their most profound devotion to the Lord Captain... personally. Young man!"

traits.locale_text: “大人！”{n}高阶顾问丹罗克向你深鞠一躬。每隔一会儿，他就会用沾着香水的汗巾擦一下脸，但表情始终充满了谄媚之意。{/n}“您的船员向您提出申请，希望能……亲自向他们的舰长大人表达他们最赤诚的敬意，都是些年轻人！”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie ! » {n}Le haut factotum vous adresse une profonde révérence. Sans se départir de son expression obséquieuse, Danrok porte régulièrement un mouchoir parfumé à son visage.{/n} « Des membres de votre équipage ont demandé à vous voir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ils souhaitent vous assurer... personnellement de leur indéfectible dévotion. Jeune homme ! »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The High Factotum bows low. Every few moments, Danrok brings a perfumed cloth to his face, but his expression remains obsequious.{/n} "Members of your crew have made a request to allow them to proclaim their most profound devotion to the Lord Captain... personally. Young man!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie ! » {n}Le haut factotum vous adresse une profonde révérence. Sans se départir de son expression obséquieuse, Danrok porte régulièrement un mouchoir parfumé à son visage.{/n} « Des membres de votre équipage ont demandé à vous voir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ils souhaitent vous assurer... personnellement de leur indéfectible dévotion. Jeune homme ! »

languages.text: 「陛下！」{n}ハイ・ファクトタムが深く礼をする。ダンロックは香水の沁みた布を何度も自分の顔に遣るが、表情は媚びへつらったままだ。{/n}「船員のメンバーたちが、ロード・キャプテンへの畏敬の念を表明できるよう嘆願書を提出してまいりました…直接あなた様に。若者よ！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The High Factotum bows low. Every few moments, Danrok brings a perfumed cloth to his face, but his expression remains obsequious.{/n} "Members of your crew have made a request to allow them to proclaim their most profound devotion to the Lord Captain... personally. Young man!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下！」{n}ハイ・ファクトタムが深く礼をする。ダンロックは香水の沁みた布を何度も自分の顔に遣るが、表情は媚びへつらったままだ。{/n}「船員のメンバーたちが、ロード・キャプテンへの畏敬の念を表明できるよう嘆願書を提出してまいりました…直接あなた様に。若者よ！」

languages.text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}!». {n}El Sumo Factótum te hace una profunda reverencia. Cada pocos momentos, Danrok se lleva un trapo perfumado a la cara sin perder su expresión obsequiosa.{/n} «Los miembros de su tripulación han presentado una petición para proclamar su máxima devoción hacia su Lord Capitán... en persona. ¡Joven!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The High Factotum bows low. Every few moments, Danrok brings a perfumed cloth to his face, but his expression remains obsequious.{/n} "Members of your crew have made a request to allow them to proclaim their most profound devotion to the Lord Captain... personally. Young man!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}!». {n}El Sumo Factótum te hace una profunda reverencia. Cada pocos momentos, Danrok se lleva un trapo perfumado a la cara sin perder su expresión obsequiosa.{/n} «Los miembros de su tripulación han presentado una petición para proclamar su máxima devoción hacia su Lord Capitán... en persona. ¡Joven!».

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Das Hoch-Faktotum verneigt sich tief. Danrok führt alle paar Augenblicke ein parfümiertes Taschentuch zu sienem Gesicht, doch seine Miene bleibt unterwürfig.{/n} "Mitglieder Eurer Crew haben darum gebeten, ihre ewige Verehrung des Lord Captains verkünden zu dürfen ... persönlich. Junger Mann!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The High Factotum bows low. Every few moments, Danrok brings a perfumed cloth to his face, but his expression remains obsequious.{/n} "Members of your crew have made a request to allow them to proclaim their most profound devotion to the Lord Captain... personally. Young man!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Das Hoch-Faktotum verneigt sich tief. Danrok führt alle paar Augenblicke ein parfümiertes Taschentuch zu sienem Gesicht, doch seine Miene bleibt unterwürfig.{/n} "Mitglieder Eurer Crew haben darum gebeten, ihre ewige Verehrung des Lord Captains verkünden zu dürfen ... persönlich. Junger Mann!"

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!" {n}Arşıkâhya, ayaklarına kapanıyor. Danrok, sürekli olarak parfümlü bir bezi yüzünde gezdirse de yalakalık akan surat ifadesi değişmiyor.{/n} "Mürettebatınız, Lord Kaptan'a duydukları derin bağlılığı şahsen ifade etmelerine müsaade etmenizi talep ediyor. Delikanlı!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}The High Factotum bows low. Every few moments, Danrok brings a perfumed cloth to his face, but his expression remains obsequious.{/n} "Members of your crew have made a request to allow them to proclaim their most profound devotion to the Lord Captain... personally. Young man!"
